com.smartcar.sdk

Class SmartcarAuth

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartcar.sdk.SmartcarAuth

  • public class SmartcarAuth
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class that provides SDK access methods.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SmartcarAuth

        public SmartcarAuth(java.lang.String clientId,
                    java.lang.String redirectUri,
                    java.lang.String scope,
                    SmartcarCallback callback)
        Constructs an instance with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        clientId - The client's ID
        redirectUri - The client's redirect URI
        scope - A space-separated list of authentication scopes
        callback - Handler to a Callback for receiving the authentication response

      • SmartcarAuth

        public SmartcarAuth(java.lang.String clientId,
                    java.lang.String redirectUri,
                    java.lang.String[] scope,
                    SmartcarCallback callback)
        Constructs an instance with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        clientId - The client's ID
        redirectUri - The client's redirect URI
        scope - An array of authentication scopes
        callback - Handler to a Callback for receiving the authentication response

      • SmartcarAuth

        public SmartcarAuth(java.lang.String clientId,
                    java.lang.String redirectUri,
                    java.lang.String scope,
                    boolean testMode,
                    SmartcarCallback callback)
        Constructs an instance with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        clientId - The client's ID
        redirectUri - The client's redirect URI
        scope - An array of authentication scopes
        testMode - Whether to display the MOCK vehicle brand or not
        callback - Handler to a Callback for receiving the authentication response

      • SmartcarAuth

        public SmartcarAuth(java.lang.String clientId,
                    java.lang.String redirectUri,
                    java.lang.String[] scope,
                    boolean testMode,
                    SmartcarCallback callback)
        Constructs an instance with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        clientId - The client's ID
        redirectUri - The client's redirect URI
        scope - An array of authentication scopes
        testMode - Whether to display the MOCK vehicle brand or not
        callback - Handler to a Callback for receiving the authentication response

    • Method Detail

      • generateUrl

        public java.lang.String generateUrl(java.lang.String state,
                                    boolean forcePrompt,
                                    VehicleInfo authVehicleInfo)
        Generates the authorization request URI.
        Parameters:
        state - optional OAuth state to be returned on redirect
        forcePrompt - force permissions prompt to display on redirect (default: false)
        authVehicleInfo - an optional VehicleInfo object. Including the `make` property causes the car brand selection screen to be bypassed.
        Returns:
        The authorization request URI

      • generateUrl

        public java.lang.String generateUrl(java.lang.String state,
                                    boolean forcePrompt)
        Generates the authorization URI.
        Parameters:
        state - optional OAuth state to be returned on redirect
        forcePrompt - force permissions prompt to display on redirect (default false)
        Returns:
        The authorization request URI

      • generateUrl

                                    VehicleInfo authVehicleInfo)
        Generates the authorization URI.
        Parameters:
        state - optional OAuth state to be returned on redirect
        authVehicleInfo - an optional VehicleInfo object. Including the `make` property causes the car brand selection screen to be bypassed.
        Returns:
        The authorization request URI

      • addClickHandler

        public void addClickHandler(android.content.Context context,
                            android.view.View view)
        Generates a click event listener for managing the Smartcar Auth flow, and attaches it to the input View.
        Parameters:
        context - The client application's context
        view - The View to attach the Smartcar Auth flow launch to

      • addClickHandler

        public void addClickHandler(android.content.Context context,
                            android.view.View view,
                            java.lang.String state,
                            boolean forcePrompt)
        Generates a click event listener for managing the Smartcar Auth flow, and attaches it to the input View.
        Parameters:
        context - The client application's context
        view - The View to attach the Smartcar Auth flow launch to
        state - optional OAuth state to be returned on redirect
        forcePrompt - force permissions prompt to display on redirect (default: false)

      • addClickHandler

                            android.view.View view,
                            java.lang.String state)
        Generates a click event listener for managing the Smartcar Auth flow, and attaches it to the input View.
        Parameters:
        context - The client application's context
        view - The View to attach the Smartcar Auth flow launch to
        state - optional OAuth state to be returned on redirect

      • addClickHandler

        public void addClickHandler(android.content.Context context,
                            android.view.View view,
                            boolean forcePrompt)
        Generates a click event listener for managing the Smartcar Auth flow, and attaches it to the input View.
        Parameters:
        context - The client application's context
        view - The View to attach the Smartcar Auth flow launch to
        forcePrompt - force permissions prompt to display on redirect (default: false)

      • launchAuthFlow

        public void launchAuthFlow(android.content.Context context)
        Starts the launch of the Smartcar auth flow. Use this to attach to any event trigger like a swipe or touch event on the client application.
        Parameters:
        context - The client application's context

      • launchAuthFlow

        public void launchAuthFlow(android.content.Context context,
                           java.lang.String state,
                           boolean forcePrompt)
        Starts the launch of the Smartcar auth flow. Use this to attach to any event trigger like a swipe or touch event on the client application.
        Parameters:
        context - The client application's context
        state - optional OAuth state to be returned on redirect
        forcePrompt - force permissions prompt to display on redirect (default: false)

      • launchAuthFlow

        public void launchAuthFlow(android.content.Context context,
                           java.lang.String state)
        Starts the launch of the Smartcar auth flow. Use this to attach to any event trigger like a swipe or touch event on the client application.
        Parameters:
        context - The client application's context
        state - optional OAuth state to be returned on redirect

      • launchAuthFlow

        public void launchAuthFlow(android.content.Context context,
                           boolean forcePrompt)
        Starts the launch of the Smartcar auth flow. Use this to attach to any event trigger like a swipe or touch event on the client application.
        Parameters:
        context - The client application's context
        forcePrompt - force permissions prompt to display on redirect (default: false)

      • receiveResponse

        protected static void receiveResponse(android.net.Uri uri)
        Receives the response for the authorization request and sends it back to the calling function via the callback method. The code is packed in a Bundle with the key "code".
        Parameters:
        uri - The response data as a Uri
